chain.description: Name of the chain (e.g. iotex, ethereum)

network.description: Name of the network (e.g. mainnet, testnet)

provider.description: Name of the provider (e.g. casimir, infura, alchemy)

created_at.description: The date and time of the event in ISO 8601 format e.g. 2015-03-04T22:44:30.652Z

address.description: The address which initiated the event

amount.description: The amount of currency associated with the event

gas_used.description: The total amount of gas used

gas_limit.description: The gas limit provided by transactions in the block

base_fee.description: Post-London upgrade this represents the minimum gasUsed multiplier required for a transaction to be included in a block

burnt_fee.description: Post-London Upgrade, this represents the part of the tx fee that is burnt

validator_list.description: The list of validators in stake action
